name: The Lair
description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

exits.description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

exits.keywords: door wooden~ 1 -1 7208 E skull skulls bones decay~ On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the  forehead.  All the bones are broken and old.

extra_descriptions.description: The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.
